My Care Questionnaire

Increasing access via AI-based, voice-first interfaces.

Try Now

Video Demo

Motivation

Non-completion of medical assessments may result in undiagnosed or undertreated medical problems. Our preliminary data has shown that older patients with higher degree of frailty required more assistance in completing geriatric assessments, which could lead to non-completion and have a negative impact on outcomes on patients who may need treatment for frailty the most. To address this problem, we developed a novel way of delivering geriatric assessments, My Care Questionnaire, to increase the number of patients who can complete geriatric assessments without assistance. While My Care Questionnaire is being developed with the needs of older patients in mind, it may serve people of all ages in different contexts.

2. Cuadra, A.; Tin, A.; Moffat, G.; Alexander, K.; Downey, R.; Korc-Grodzicki, B.; Vickers, A.; & Shahrokni, A. (2022). The association between perioperative frailty and ability to complete a web-based geriatric assessment among older adults with cancer. European Journal of Surgical Oncology (EJSO).

3. Cuadra, A., Chen, Y., Cho, K., Estrin, E., & Shahrokni, A. . (2022). Introducing the v-RFA, a Voice Assistant-based Geriatric Assessment. Journal of Geriatric Oncology (JGO).

4. Cuadra, A.; Tin, A.; Shahrokni, A. (2022). The association between perioperative frailty and ability to complete a web-based geriatric assessment in older adults with cancer. Annual Meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO).
